name: PresidentIdle (working title)
description:
WORK IN PROGRESS

PresidentIdle (working title)

Sorry that this build will seem pretty broken, but I wanted to get something uploaded for the Summer Slow Jam submission. More updates will follow!

How to Play:

  • Hover the mouse by the edge of the screen to move
  • Use the mouse wheel to zoom in and out
  • Click on a President to select them and assign them a Task
  • When the President finishes a Task, click them to claim your Power reward.
  • Spend Power to obtain more Presidents.
  • Power can also be spent to purchase Landmarks (coming soon)
  • Press Q to quit
